title: Asparagus and broccoli salad
ingredients: ['500g green asparagus', '500g white asparagus', '500g broccoli, washed and separated into florets', 'salt to taste', '1 teaspoon granulated sugar', '30g butter', '50g hazelnuts', '4 to 5 tablespoons sherry vinegar', '6 tablespoons olive oil', '2 egg yolks (see note)', '2 bunches flat-leaf parsley, washed, dried and chopped']
